auth.loginPrompt: Sign in with your Xbox account to access your comparison groups
auth.loginErrorMessage: Xbox login failed. Please try again.
auth.dataCollectedInfo: By logging in, only your Xbox Gamertag and identifier are retrieved to identify you.

groups.title: My Groups
groups.noGroupsDescription: Create a group to start comparing your reputations with other pirates!

reputations.title: My Reputations
reputations.noDataDescription: Import your reputation data to view them
reputations.deleteWarningMessage: This action is irreversible. All your progression data will be deleted.
reputations.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all your reputation data?

tutorial.title: How to get your reputation data
tutorial.subtitle: Two methods to export your data from Sea of Thieves
tutorial.privacyDescription: These methods only use your own data from the official website. No password or cookie is shared.

step1.title: Install the bookmarklet
step1.description: Drag this button to your bookmarks bar:

instructions.2: Right-click on your bookmarks bar â†’ "Add page" or "Add bookmark"
instructions.4: Paste the code in the URL/Address field

step2.title: Go to Sea of Thieves
step2.description: Go to the reputation page on the official website and sign in with your Xbox account.

step3.title: Click the bookmarklet
step3.description: Once logged in on seaofthieves.com, click the bookmarklet in your bookmarks bar. A window will appear with two options:
step3.optionImportDescription: Sends your data directly to our site. You will be redirected to finalize the import.
step3.optionCopyDescription: Copies the JSON to your clipboard for manual import later.

manual.intro: This method is more technical but works on all browsers.
manual.step1Description: Go to the reputation page and sign in.
manual.step2Description: Language selector at the bottom of the page.
manual.step6Description: Type "reputation" in the search bar to find the /api/profilev2/reputation request
manual.step7Description: Click on the request, go to the "Response" tab and copy all the content (Ctrl+A then Ctrl+C).
manual.step8Description: Go back to the "My Reputations" page and paste the JSON in the import field.

import.title: Import my data
import.tipDescription: See the tutorial to learn how to get your data
import.jsonPlaceholder: Paste here the JSON retrieved from seaofthieves.com...

invite.invitedToJoin: You have been invited to join the group
invite.alreadyMember: You are already a member of this group.
invite.joinedRedirecting: You have joined the group! Redirecting...
invite.loginToJoin: Sign in with your Xbox account to join this group.

importPage.successDescription: Your reputation data has been imported.
importPage.expiredDescription: This import link has expired or has already been used.
importPage.expiredHint: Please run the bookmarklet again on the Sea of Thieves website.
importPage.title: Import my reputations
importPage.loginToImport: Sign in with your Xbox account to import this data.
importPage.dataAssociated: This data will be associated with your account

groupPage.noDataDescription: Group members need to import their reputation data.
groupPage.shareLinkHint: Share this link to invite pirates to join the group.
groupPage.chefDescription: All permissions. Only one leader per group.
groupPage.transferWarning: By transferring the Leader role, you will become a Moderator.
groupPage.confirmRemove: Do you really want to remove
groupPage.removeHint: This person will need to be invited again to rejoin the group.
groupPage.confirmLeave: Do you really want to leave the group
groupPage.deleteWarning: This action is irreversible. All members will be removed from the group.

users.title: Users
users.description: View all users and their groups

bookmarklet.wrongSite: This bookmarklet must be run from the official Sea of Thieves website.
bookmarklet.wrongSiteHint: Once on the site, click the bookmarklet again to retrieve your data.

bookmarklet.newVersionHint: You will need to reinstall the bookmarklet from the tutorial page.
bookmarklet.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to Sea of Thieves.
bookmarklet.ensureLoggedIn: Make sure you are logged in on seaofthieves.com

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: The content of this site (texts, images, source code) is the property of its author, unless otherwise stated.
intellectual.trademark: Sea of Thieves is a registered trademark of Microsoft Corporation and Rare Ltd. This site is not affiliated with, endorsed or sponsored by Microsoft or Rare.
intellectual.disclaimer: Names, logos and images related to Sea of Thieves are used for informational purposes only and belong to their respective owners.

dataCollected.title: Data Collected
dataCollected.reputation: Sea of Thieves reputation data (voluntarily imported by the user)

purpose.title: Purpose of Processing
purpose.content: The collected data is used solely to allow users to compare their Sea of Thieves progression with other players.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: Data is kept as long as the user account is active. You can delete your data at any time from the "My Reputations" page.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, delete and port your data. To exercise these rights, contact us by email.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: This site uses cookies strictly necessary for the service to function:
cookies.noTracking: No advertising or analytics tracking cookies are used.

liability.title: Liability
liability.accuracy: The information provided on this site is for informational purposes only. We strive to maintain accurate information but cannot guarantee the absence of errors.
liability.availability: We cannot guarantee the permanent availability of the service. The site may be interrupted for maintenance or updates.
liability.thirdParty: This site is not responsible for the content of external sites to which it may link.

law.title: Applicable Law
law.content: These legal notices are subject to French law. In case of dispute, French courts shall have exclusive jurisdiction.
